root.name: My Friends
root.description: Create pixelated friends using a huge collection of clothes, accessories and colors. If you enjoy being unsocial and would prefer to have fake friends using your DS, this is the game for you. This simulation game allows the user to create whatever kind of friends they desire, from purple hair and green shoes, to green hair and purple boots! The possibilities are almost endless! Keep your friends happy by giving them makeovers or giving them crazy new names. Nothing spells out fun like imaginary pixalated friends that you can alter anytime you want! Keeping your friends happy unlocks more games, clothes, accessories and hairstyles. It's even possibly to unlock new hangouts. No more living room bandits here! Using the DS Wireless Communications allows users to share gifts with real life friends who also have a DS. Share your video game friends with your real life friends!
